title: Hybrid car sales surge amid global policy push
description: Electric vehicle sales are rising globally due to policy pushes and stricter emission norms, but hybrid vehicles are gaining popularity faster. Since 2021, hybrid sales have surged in China, Japan, Korea, UK, France, and the US. India has also seen a slight increase in hybrid penetration despite fewer models available compared to electric vehicles.
